articles.title: AI Boom, Entry-Level Bust: Why College Grads Are Struggling to Land Jobs
articles.summary: As artificial intelligence transforms the job market, recent college graduates are finding it harder to land entry-level roles in competitive fields like tech and finance ‚Äî even with strong r√©sum√©s and top internships. Economists point to a surge in AI adoption, along with a slowdown in post-pandemic hiring, as key factors driving unemployment among college grads above the national average. Financial leaders like Centerview Partners‚Äô Blair Effron warn that although the AI revolution will boost long-term productivity, short-term impacts on employment will be swift and dramatic. (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.summary: In a blow to Tesla‚Äôs efforts in artificial intelligence, the company has decided to disband its Dojo supercomputer team. Bloomberg‚Äôs Max Chafkin discusses what‚Äôs behind the move and how the company will pivot with Caroline Hyde on ‚ÄúBloomberg Tech.‚Äù (Source: Bloomberg)
